content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Apr 2019Are there any ways to invest that would turn $10k into $1,000,000 in 20 years?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 03 Apr 2019Well, assuming you do not have any capital injections along the way, your initial 10k would be compounding by at least 26% p.a consistentlyI am not sure where to find a 26% compounding investment that is consistent0 comments3

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 03 Apr 2019Gabriel is right.But if you're willing to add another 10k every year, you only need to perform at 14% per annum consistently to turn that 200k to 1m.Still easier said than done, but much more doable than 26% per annum.0 comments1
